metadata.title: CVE-2024-54505 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
A type confusion issue was addressed with improved memory handling. Thisissue is fixed in iPadOS 17.7.3, watchOS 11.2, visionOS 2.2, tvOS 18.2,macOS Sequoia 15.2, Safari 18.2, iOS 18.2 and iPadOS 18.2. Processingmaliciously crafted web content may lead to memory corruption.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-54505` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.1 - 2.46.5-0ubuntu0.24.04.1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-6.0 - 2.46.5-0ubuntu0.24.04.1
gir1.2-webkit-6.0 - 2.46.5-0ubuntu0.24.04.1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.1 - 2.46.5-0ubuntu0.24.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.46.5-0ubuntu0.24.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.1-0 - 2.46.5-0ubuntu0.24.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-6.0-1 - 2.46.5-0ubuntu0.24.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-bin - 2.46.5-0ubuntu0.24.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.1-0 - 2.46.5-0ubuntu0.24.04.1
libwebkitgtk-6.0-4 - 2.46.5-0ubuntu0.24.04.1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.46.5-0ubuntu0.24.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.46.5-0ubuntu0.24.04.1').
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
